org.apache.flink.runtime.protocols

Interface JobManagerProtocol

  • All Superinterfaces:
    VersionedProtocol
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JobManager

    public interface JobManagerProtocol
extends VersionedProtocol
    The job manager protocol is implemented by the job manager and offers functionality to task managers which allows them to register themselves, send heart beat messages or to report the results of a task execution.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RegisterTaskManagerResult registerTaskManager(InstanceConnectionInfo instanceConnectionInfo, HardwareDescription hardwareDescription, IntegerRecord numberOfSlots)
      Registers a task manager at the JobManager.
      void sendHeartbeat(InstanceConnectionInfo instanceConnectionInfo)
      Sends a heart beat to the job manager.
      void updateTaskExecutionState(TaskExecutionState taskExecutionState)
      Reports an update of a task's execution state to the job manager.

    • Method Detail

      • sendHeartbeat

        void sendHeartbeat(InstanceConnectionInfo instanceConnectionInfo)
            throws IOException
        Sends a heart beat to the job manager.
        Parameters:
        instanceConnectionInfo - the information the job manager requires to connect to the instance's task manager
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if an error occurs during this remote procedure call

      • registerTaskManager

        RegisterTaskManagerResult registerTaskManager(InstanceConnectionInfo instanceConnectionInfo,
                                              HardwareDescription hardwareDescription,
                                              IntegerRecord numberOfSlots)
                                       throws IOException
        Registers a task manager at the JobManager.
        Parameters:
        instanceConnectionInfo - the information the job manager requires to connect to the instance's task manager
        hardwareDescription - a hardware description with details on the instance's compute resources.
        Returns:
        whether the task manager was successfully registered
        Throws:
        IOException

      • updateTaskExecutionState

        void updateTaskExecutionState(TaskExecutionState taskExecutionState)
                       throws IOException
        Reports an update of a task's execution state to the job manager.
        Parameters:
        taskExecutionState - the new task execution state
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if an error occurs during this remote procedure call
